amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: amendments numbered 43, 44, 7, 25, 27, 33, 46, 51, 52, and 54 printed in House Report 111-182.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the list of amendments submitted by the Chairman offered en bloc: amendments numbered 43, 44, 7, 25, 27, 33, 46, 51, 52, and 54 printed in House Report 111-182.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
